examples: She carried her books in a backpack.
He packed his clothes in a suitcase.
The grocery bag was filled with fresh produce.
Ela carregava seus livros em uma mochila.
Ele colocou suas roupas em uma mala.
A sacola de compras estava cheia de produtos frescos.

suggested: Why did the bag go to therapy? Because it had too many issues to 'bag'gage!
Feeling a sense of sadness when you realize you've lost an important item that was in your bag.
I get so angry when someone forcefully grabs or snatches a bag, causing distress or harm.
Did you know that the world's largest handbag weighs over 5,000 pounds? It's as big as a car!
There's no specific smell associated with a bag, but it might remind you of the scent of leather or fabric.
The texture and feel of different types of bags, such as the smoothness of a leather bag or the softness of a fabric tote.
Bags are essential accessories that connect us to our belongings, offering convenience and carrying our personal items.
